targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*)
FROM states
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated) AND
  current_state = 'WAIT_EXTERNAL_EVENT' AND
  current_form = $form
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM states
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated) AND
  current_state = 'QOUT' AND
  current_form = $form AND
  (NOW() - updated) < interval '24 hours'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timeout_date,$__interval),
  current_form,
  count(*)::INT AS "value"
FROM
  states
WHERE 
  current_form = ANY($form) AND 
  current_state = 'WAIT_EXTERNAL_EVENT' AND
  timeout_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
  1, 2
ORDER BY 
  1

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM states
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated) AND
  current_state = 'WAIT_EXTERNAL_EVENT' AND
  current_form = ANY($form)
ORDER BY 1

current.text: baselinehin + follow1hin + follow2hin + follow3hin + follow4hin + follow5hin + follow6hin + follow7hin + follow8hin

list.definition: select distinct(current_form) as form from states where updated > NOW() - interval '7 days' order by form
list.name: form
list.query: select distinct(current_form) as form from states where updated > NOW() - interval '7 days' order by form
